title: Yes, Your Hoodie Can Be Chic—Here Are 15 Options to Prove It
description: Consider this the unsung hero of your wardrobe.
excerpt: In the market for a new layer? Turn to a hoodie. Shop our best hoodies for women that serve ultimate comfort and coziness, from pullovers to full-zips.
text: Always Reliable Buck Mason Vintage Interloop Full-Zip HoodieYou can find everything you want in a hoodie in this one from Buck Mason. It has a full-zip, hits just below the waistband, and isn’t too heavy; I guarantee it will be your new go-to daily hoodie. html:
Always Reliable

Buck Mason Vintage Interloop Full-Zip Hoodie

You can find everything you want in a hoodie in this one from Buck Mason. It has a full-zip, hits just below the waistband, and isn’t too heavy; I guarantee it will be your new go-to daily hoodie.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Heather Oat, Birchwood, River Rock

Material: Cotton French Terry

Fan Favorite

Lululemon Scuba Oversized Half-Zip Hoodie

Lululemon Scuba hoodies are ultra-popular for good reason: they’re soft, versatile, and come in a variety of colors. Plus, they’re perfect for throwing on over your workout clothes, and while all the styles are great, the half-zip is my personal favorite.

Sizes: XS/S-XL/XXL

Colors: 8 options

Material: Cotton, polyester

Customer review: “I did not think I would love this hoodie as much as I do! The quality of the fabric and zipper are awesome. The length is perfect - not too short and not too long.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Preppy Take

Polo Ralph Lauren Cotton-Blend Jersey Hoodie

A subtle navy Polo logo accents this classic grey hoodie to make it feel both chic and athletic. Wear it on its own with a pair of jeans or trousers or pair it with matching sweatpants.

Sizes: XXS-2XL

Colors: Dark Vintage Heather

Material: Cotton, polyester

Keep It Simple

Madewell Midweight Hoodie Sweatshirt

A no-frills hoodie that isn’t too light or too heavy goes. This will go with everything from your sweats and leggings to your jeans, dresses, and skirts.

Sizes: XXS-2XL

Colors: Coal, Parchment

Material: Cotton, polyester

Customer review: “The fit and cut of this hoodie is perfect. I love the weight of it too. The color is super nice as well! Definitely, my favorite hoodie!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Cropped and Cool

Alo Muse Hoodie

Alo makes some of the comfiest hoodies on the market, and this cropped version is no exception. Best of all, you’ll find yourself reaching for it for more than just going to the gym. It’s perfect for weekend brunch or even a low-key night out!

Sizes: XXS-L

Colors: 6 options

Material: Polyester, rayon, spandex

Customer review: “I love this hoodie. It’s super comfortable and fits well.”

Something Different

YanYan Daisy Oversize Embroidered Lambswool Hoodie

For something different, try this lambswool embroidered pointelle option, which has become a quick favorite of ELLE’s senior fashion commerce editor, Dale Arden Chong. The button closure adds a lovely finishing touch to a hoodie that is unlike anything you have in your closet.

Sizes: S/M-L/XL

Colors: Chalk

Material: Lambswool

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sweater-Like

Veronica Beard Billy Hoodie

This wool and cashmere blend hoodie is a dream come true for those who want to feel cozy and put-together. It’s a refined take on a classic staple.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Oatmeal

Material: Wool, cashmere, nylon, elastane

Basic Blues

AGOLDE Mari Hoodie

Yes, your favorite denim brand also makes comfortable fleece hoodies. The color of this cropped style feels reminiscent of a dusty robin’s egg blue, which will feel like a new neutral for this spring.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Mineral

Material: Cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Oversized Everyday

COS Oversized Jersey Hoodie

Prefer an oversized hoodie? Grab this relaxed option from COS. It’s comfortable, cool, and great for everyday wear.

Sizes: XS-L

Colors: Black, Cobalt Blue

Material: Cotton

Super Sporty

Adidas by Stella McCartney Full Zip Hoodie

If you’re like me and want every single thing that comes out of the Adidas by Stella McCartney collaboration, this hoodie will be right up your alley. It’s basic in the best way possible, you’ll find yourself reaching for it daily.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Medium Heather Grey

Material: Cotton, polyester

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Dreamy Hue

Vuori Restore Oversized Hoodie

Vuori continues to impress with its California-inspired performance attire and loungewear, so it’s no surprise its oversized hoodie should be at the top of your list. If you are one who prefers to have no pockets in their jackets, this one has a seamless look and comfortable feel.

Sizes: XS-2XL

Colors: Light Mist, Twilight

Material: Cotton, polyester

Customer review: “Oversized as promised and a great color. Fit and styling were both great. Has held up nicely in the wash.”

Lightweight & Lovely

James Perse French Cotton-terry Hoodie

A lightweight hoodie is the ultimate layering piece, especially when the weather starts to get warmer. Make sure you pack it for your next vacation, it’s an essential right alongside your travel tote and sunscreen.

Sizes: 0-4 (2-10)

Colors: 6 options

Material: Cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Pretty Pink

SKIMS Cotton Fleece Classic Zip-Up Hoodie

This hoodie is super soft and cozy—two things that make a sweatshirt one that you’ll reach for time and time again.

Sizes: XXS-4XL

Colors: Barely Pink, Light Heather Grey, Onyx

Material: Cotton, polyester

Customer review: “Love these hoodies. They’re warm and versatile. The perfect staple for any closet.”

A Soft Touch

Savage x Fenty Essential Fleece Pullover Drawstring Hoodie

Beyond it being a soft and plush hoodie, a drawstring hem sets this Fenty x Puma cropped style apart from the rest, allowing you to cinch it however you like. Add some sweatpants and you have an easy outfit, ideal for lounging.

Sizes: XS-4XL

Colors: Beige Latte Heather, Black Caviar

Material: Cotton, polyester

Customer review: “I absolutely love this hoodie! The cinched waist adds a stylish touch, while the free-flowing option is perfect for comfort and lounging. The oversized hood makes it incredibly cozy. I've only washed it once so far and hung it to dry, but it seems to be excellent quality and remains super comfortable. Highly recommend!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Cozy Cashmere

Faherty Tropical Cashmere Hoodie

Not every hoodie of yours needs to be made from a cotton jersey material. This cashmere one is undeniably elevated and chic. In other words, it’s perfect for a day out and lounging at home.

Sizes: XS-L

Colors: Driftwood

Material: Cashmere

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
